title: relation to paragraph 3 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Carriage of Passengers, Freight
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Carriage of Passengers, Freight 

and Mail by Air) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (carriage passenger freight mail air) order 2025

title: relation to paragraph 3 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 2. (1) In this Order -
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order - 

“airport authority” means the body responsible for the management, operation 
and development of an airport in the State; 

“Annex” means Annex I to the Regulation; 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EC) No. 437/2003 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 27 February 20031, as amended by Commission Regulation 
(EC) No. 1358/2003 of 31 July 20032, Commission Regulation (EC) No. 
546/2005 of 8 April 20053, Council Regulation (EC) No. 1791/2006 of 20 
November 20064, Regulation (EC) No. 219/2009 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 11 March 20095 and Council Regulation (EU) No. 
517/2013 of 13 May 20136; 

“survey” means the survey that is conducted by the Central Statistics Office for 
the purpose of obtaining the information specified in Articles 3 and 4 from 
airport authorities of airports specified in the Schedule, other than in relation to 
the authority of the airport specified in paragraph 3 of Part 2 thereof, including 
for the purpose of compliance with the Regulation. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, except 
where the context otherwise requires. 

1 OJ No. L 66, 11.3.2003, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 194, 1.8.2003, p. 9 
3 OJ No. L 91, 9.4.2005, p. 5 
4 OJ No. L 363, 20.12.2006, p. 1 
5 OJ No. L 87, 31.3.2009, p. 109 
6 OJ No. L 158, 10.6.2013, p. 1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 11th February, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [24] 3

title: relation to paragraph 3 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 3. (1) A requirement on an airport authority that manages an airport referred
text_raw:
3. (1) A requirement on an airport authority that manages an airport referred 
to in Part 1 of the Schedule to provide, for the purposes of the survey, 
information in accordance with Tables A and B of the Annex is prescribed. 

(2) The airport authorities in relation to which a requirement to provide 
information is prescribed in paragraph (1) shall provide the relevant information 
monthly in relation to the immediately preceding month in the period from 
January 2025 to December 2029.
text_norm: 3 (1) requirement airport authority manages airport referred part 1 schedule provide purpose survey information accordance table b annex prescribed (2) airport authority relation requirement provide information prescribed paragraph (1) shall provide relevant information monthly relation immediately preceding month period january 2025 december 2029

title: relation to paragraph 3 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 4. (1) A requirement on an airport authority that manages an airport referred
text_raw:
4. (1) A requirement on an airport authority that manages an airport referred 
to in Part 1 or 2 of the Schedule to provide, for the purposes of the survey, 
information in accordance with Table C of the Annex is prescribed. 

(2) The airport authorities in relation to which a requirement to provide 
information is prescribed in paragraph (1) shall provide the relevant information 
annually in relation to the immediately preceding year in the period 2025 to
text_norm: 4 (1) requirement airport authority manages airport referred part 1 2 schedule provide purpose survey information accordance table c annex prescribed (2) airport authority relation requirement provide information prescribed paragraph (1) shall provide relevant information annually relation immediately preceding year period 2025
